Package org.crazyrecipes.recipebuddy.recipe

Class Recipe

java.lang.Object
org.crazyrecipes.recipebuddy.recipe.Recipe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Recipe extends Object implements Serializable
Recipe stores a single recipe. Each recipe has an ID, a name, a description, a rating, a times cooked counter, a list of ingredients, a list of utensils, a list of allergens, a list of steps, and a list of tags.
See Also:
